name: tic-tac-toe-backend
description: Tic Tac Toe Multiplayer Game Backend

scripts.start: node --import 'data:text/javascript,import { register } from "node:module"; import { pathToFileURL } from "node:url"; register("ts-node/esm", pathToFileURL("./"));' src/index.ts
scripts.dev: nodemon --watch 'src/**/*.ts' --exec 'node --import "data:text/javascript,import { register } from \"node:module\"; import { pathToFileURL } from \"node:url\"; register(\"ts-node/esm\", pathToFileURL(\"./\"));"' src/index.ts
